narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
Applicant wants to be licensed as a Class "C" Exhibitor.
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
License fee will be sent to:
USDA APHIS Animal Care
2150 Centre Avenue
Building B 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526
This inspection and exit interview were conducted by APHIS personnel with applicant.
Additional Inspectors
Irwin Bryan, Compliance Specialist
